properties.Description: Design and site work to provide a partial parallel taxiway, new apron for larger corporate aircraft parking, fueling, and hangar development. The existing terminal area apron is built out and is not large enough to accommodate these aircraft. (2269)
Construct a new taxiway with the standard 300'  of separation from the Runway (3798)

The existing runway length is 5000'. The NC GA Development Plan recommended a runway length of 5500'. This project will extend the runway to 6000' as shown on the current ALP. (includes Project Request Numbers: 3209 )
